features.title: Why do you need llms.txt?
features.description: As AI technology evolves, controlling how your website content is used by AI models becomes crucial. The llms.txt file is a standard way to specify which content can be trained on by AI.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our tool makes creating llms.txt files simple, requiring just a few steps to complete
